subject: BIG PROMLEM!!! URGENT!!! Order #SSN3012
description_text:
This is what I wrote yesterday, didn't receive a response yet:

Hello, I have just received pedals from my order. The order is missing the
base-plate, which I ordered.
Seriously, what is wrong with you? How can you send me the wrong product
when there is even a picture that this one has no baseplate on the front? I
am expecting you to propose a serious compensation on top of sending me the
baseplate first class express shipping of course. So I can have it here in
few days.
I am the founder of very well known simracing community and this mistake
will cost us a lot in damages, as this product was supposed to be used for
marketing purposes!!!

We have sent out a person to SEMA show to make contact with automotive
brands, getting sponsorships for us and had planned to make POV marketing
content using the pedals, to continue the momentum on social media (we
received over 150k views in past 3 days). On top of that, we have meetings
with investors willing to invest tens of thousands of dollars into our
project, as we aim to become the biggest simracing community in the next
year. Your failure to deliver the correct version of product thus has
massive implications and is timed in the worst possible way. We demand this
case to be treated with the highest priority, as it is possibly costing us
a fortune in missed opportunities. Let me know ASAP on how this will be
handled in a way that we can continue with our plan and minimize damages.We
certainly need the missing part of the order to be delivered by express
mail within days of receiving this complaint and are also asking for some
form of compensation that we are willing to discuss.

We ordered pedals with baseplate, this is what came in the mail (just the
pedals):
[image: unnamed (1).jpg][image: unnamed.jpg]
without the baseplate our marketing plan is ruined, as there is no way to
mount the hardware to the sim-rig, thus no way to make the content that was
already supposed to be made, edited and posted. We invested quite a lot of
resources to position our guy at SEMA autoshow, and also to get in touch
with investment companies, etc. . We will seek ways to compensate, but I am
confident you can make this right so we do not have to.

Let me know ASAP on the course of action.

Thank you,

regards,

-Mgr. Lukas Horvath

conversations.body_text: Hi Lukáš Horváth,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock for the base plates, and restocking has been severely delayed due to customs clearance backlogs. We will ship your base plates via DHL Express within the next couple of days. We deeply regret the delay.

Hi, well calling it an inconvenience is quite an understatement, as per the
reasons I stated in my previous messages. Moreso that based on your
message, it will take at least another week until we are able to execute on
our plan, which will be too late, thus we need to spend extra resources for
an emergency solution.

Time is money, so I was expecting some proposal on your side on
compensation for this problem. We would accept either product (sending the
haptic reactors with the baseplate for example), or working out some
marketing cooperation between our community and Simsonn - i am the founder
of INITIAL G - www.initialg.gg . I can discuss further with your narketing
department if needed

Dňa ut 4. 11. 2025, 7:59 service@simsonn.com
